# Functions We Need

```{r}
# dice = c(1:6)
# sample(dice, 1)

sample(x = 1:6, 1)

roll_one_die <- function(){
  sample(x=1:6, 1)
}

roll_two_dice <- function() {
  roll_one_die() + roll_one_die()
}
```

```{r}
thousand_rolls <- tibble(map_int(1:1000, ~ roll_two_dice())) 


hist(thousand_rolls)
```
